sdlc_directory_enforcement.critical_rule:
MANDATORY: ALL development work (Roo modes, Claude agents, shared docs) must happen in sdlc/ directory.
NEVER create or edit files in root .roo/ or .claude/ directories.
NO EXCEPTIONS. THIS IS NON-NEGOTIABLE.
sdlc_directory_enforcement.overview: Complete SDLC directory enforcement rules for both Roo and Claude defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/universal/sdlc-directory-enforcement.md
sdlc_directory_enforcement.includes: - Core principles (development isolation, production protection, context boundaries) - Directory usage rules for Roo modes - Directory usage rules for Claude agents - Shared documentation guidelines - Development workflows (creating new modes/agents) - Deployment process - Forbidden actions (with examples) - Correct actions (with examples) - Error prevention checklist - Combined architecture view - Success criteria

applies_to.roo: ALL Roo modes - development in sdlc/.roo/, deployment to root .roo/
applies_to.claude: ALL Claude agents - development in sdlc/.claude/
